name: @neutronstarer/bridge
description: js bridge between native and web, component of bridge_os and bridge_android

scripts.dev: npx rollup -c rollup.config.bridge.dev.js && npx rollup -c rollup.config.hub.dev.js
scripts.build: npx rollup -c rollup.config.bridge.js && npx rollup -c rollup.config.hub.js

author: neutronstarer
